# Warden Registration

To register as a warden, please fill out this form and join us in
[Discord](https://discord.gg/code4rena)

  * Register with Wallet
  * Register with Password

Code4rena Username *

 **Choose wisely! Your username cannot be changed later.**  
Used to report findings, as well as display your total award amount on the
leaderboard. Supports alphanumeric characters, underscores, and hyphens.  
(Note: for consistency, please ensure your server nickname in our Discord
matches the username you provide here)

Discord Username *

Used in case we need to contact you about your submissions or winnings.

Email Address *

Used for sending confirmation emails for each of your submissions.

Password *

Must be at least 18 characters long.

Confirm Password *

GitHub Username (Optional)

Used in case we need to give you access to certain repositories.

Avatar (Optional)

An avatar displayed next to your name on the leaderboard.

Use my wallet address for payment on Polygon

By submitting this form, you agree to abide by the C4 [code of
conduct](https://discord.com/channels/810916927919620096/851883682470166558/851891396255940618)
and [submission policy](https://docs.code4rena.com/roles/wardens/submission-
policy). If moderators determine you to be in violation of these guidelines,
you may be subject to consequences which could include a ban or forfeiture of
awards.

Register with MetaMaskRegister with WalletConnect
